title: Solomon's Song 1:1
text: THE song of songs, which is Solomon's.

title: Solomon's Song 1:2
text: Let him kiss me with the kisses of his mouth: for thy love is better than wine.

title: Solomon's Song 1:3
text: Because of the savour of thy good ointments thy name is as ointment poured forth, therefore do the virgins love thee.

title: Solomon's Song 1:4
text: Draw me, we will run after thee: the king hath brought me into his chambers: we will be glad and rejoice in thee, we will remember thy love more than wine: the upright love thee.

title: Solomon's Song 1:5
text: I am black, but comely, O ye daughters of Jerusalem, as the tents of Kedar, as the curtains of Solomon.

title: Solomon's Song 1:6
text: Look not upon me, because I am black, because the sun hath looked upon me: my mother's children were angry with me; they made me the keeper of the vineyards; but mine own vineyard have I not kept.

title: Solomon's Song 1:7
text: Tell me, O thou whom my soul loveth, where thou feedest, where thou makest thy flock to rest at noon: for why should I be as one that turneth aside by the flocks of thy companions?

title: Solomon's Song 1:8
text: If thou know not, O thou fairest among women, go thy way forth by the footsteps of the flock, and feed thy kids beside the shepherds' tents.

title: Solomon's Song 1:9
text: I have compared thee, O my love, to a company of horses in Pharaoh's chariots.

title: Solomon's Song 1:10
text: Thy cheeks are comely with rows of jewels, thy neck with chains of gold.

title: Solomon's Song 1:11
text: We will make thee borders of gold with studs of silver.

title: Solomon's Song 1:12
text: While the king sitteth at his table, my spikenard sendeth forth the smell thereof.

title: Solomon's Song 1:13
text: A bundle of myrrh is my wellbeloved unto me; he shall lie all night betwixt my breasts.

title: Solomon's Song 1:14
text: My beloved is unto me as a cluster of camphire in the vineyards of En-gedi.

title: Solomon's Song 1:15
text: Behold, thou art fair, my love; behold, thou art fair; thou hast doves' eyes.

title: Solomon's Song 1:16
text: Behold, thou art fair, my beloved, yea, pleasant: also our bed is green.

title: Solomon's Song 1:17
text: The beams of our house are cedar, and our rafters of fir.
